ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa pulled both of her guns at once.......and still had her hands free to hold the new mace she picked up as she held them in her many tentacles sticking

Plintissa pulled both of her guns at once.......and still had her hands free
to hold the new mace she picked up as she held them in her many tentacles
sticking out of her back....she fired upon the Predacons while running by,
perhaps to avoid shots......Suukie came running by and almost crashed into
her!... "watch where your going!..." she yelled at him... "sorry, friend but
i'm fighting this battle too and wasn't watching....as i ran around the
bend!.... hahahaha!" he said...... "great" thought Plintissa.....Suukie was
using his sword more than his pistol.... "here, use this, i have a blaster
and Iron Raptor handed to me, but it looks like you need it more than i
do!..." she said handing it to Suukie..... "and don't say thanks because if
i hear one more rhyme i'll scream!..." she said.....Suukie used this new
weapon.........on himself by mistake.... "you idiot! you had it pointing in
the wrong direction!....." she yelled at him.....he pointed it in the right
direction while laughing and fired upon the Predacons.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 2:07 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor snarled as she heard the top auto-gun explode, they were
> attacking their defences!!!
> She looked at Plintissa and handed her her launcher, she obviously needed
it
> more then she did.*
>
> " I want you to use this on any Predacon that you see or even makes optic
> contact with you. Got it?"
>
> * She then turned towards Tigerhawk and nodded, maybe they would have to
use
> Iris sooner then she first thought?
> Iron Raptor looked around the bridge and saw that there weren't to many
bots
> around when there should be, she snarled and hit a red button on the wall
> that activated the Ark alert system. They were under attack and the time
to
> act was now!
> Soon red lights flashed in every hallway and the main computer sounded the
> alert...*
>
> M-COMP: "Scramble, Scramble!!"
>
> * Iron Raptor reached behind her and pulled out her splatter gun, the
> enemies awaited!*
